repairedDockerfile:
FROM ubuntu:xenial
MAINTAINER Benedikt Lang <mail@blang.io>
ENV DEBIAN_FRONTEND noninteractive

RUN apt-get update -q && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -qy \
    texlive-full \
    python-pygments gnuplot \
    make git \
    && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*

WORKDIR /data
VOLUME ["/data"]
